":"0xb3d1a78f533157e69621f06aa218977a66a351e9ad9186c5a095e27e4dc8b53b","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://2190589e2c02d78fef85e2c24983b3c6e9473134315436576d3c0c06dd947410","dweb:/ipfs/Qmc7JrdeYTUzJ7VEZnDDnLcXis16W6xsMkedWdsBZTwjhH"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20Upgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4e733d3164f73f461eaf9d8087a7ad1ea180bdc8ba0d3d61b0e1ae16d8e63dff","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://75b47c3aeca7b66ea6752f8be020ec5c1c502de6ec9065272dae23d3a52196e2","dweb:/ipfs/QmUebPMHv16tYKFh5BmBQkMfRFb5b8UZ2RgVwdjxCeufVF"]}},"version":1}

returns._0: True if position is overcollaterlized, otherwise false + percentage of coverage (totalCollateralAmount / (price * tokensCollateralized))

params.collateralToDecrease: Collateral to decreased from the position
params.collateralToWithdraw: Collateral to be transferred to the LP

returns.price: Price of the pair at the moment of shutdown execution

returns._0: Addresses, weigths and total of weigths

params.inputCollateral: Input collateral amount to be exchanged

params.syntheticTokens: Amount of synthetic tokens to be exchanged

returns.collateralAmountReceived: Collateral amount will be received by the user

params.collateralToIncrease: Collateral to be added to the position
params.collateralToTransfer: Collateral to be transferred before increase collateral in the position

params.numSynthTokens: Number of synthetic tokens that user wants to liquidate

returns.collateralReceived: Amount of received collateral equal to the value of tokens liquidated
returns.rewardAmount: Amount of received collateral as reward for the liquidation

params.mintParams: Input parameters for minting (see MintParams struct)

returns.feePaid: Amount of collateral paid by the user as fee
returns.syntheticTokensMinted: Amount of synthetic tokens minted by a user

params.redeemParams: Input parameters for redeeming (see RedeemParams struct)

returns.collateralRedeemed: Amount of collateral redeem by user
returns.feePaid: Amount of collateral paid by user as fee

params.feeProportions: An array of the proportions of fees generated each recipient will receive
params.feeRecipients: An array of the addresses of recipients that will receive generated fees

params._liquidationReward: Percentage of reward for correct liquidation by a liquidator

returns.collateralSettled: Amount of collateral withdrawn after emergency shutdown

returns.poolVersion: Returns the version of this pool/self-minting derivative

returns.remainingLiquidity: Remaining unused collateral in the pool

claimFee().notice: Withdraw fees gained by the sender

collateralCoverage().notice: Returns if position is overcollateralized and thepercentage of coverage of the collateral according to the last price

collateralRequirement().notice: Returns the percentage of overcollateralization to which a liquidation can triggered

collateralToken().notice: Get the collateral token of this pool/self-minting derivative

decreaseCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Decrease collaterallization of Lp positionCheck that final poosition is not undercollateralizedOnly a sender with LP role can call this function

emergencyShutdown().notice: Shutdown the pool or self-minting-derivative in case of emergencyOnly Synthereum manager contract can call this function

emergencyShutdownPrice().notice: Returns the price of the pair at the moment of the shutdown

emergencyShutdownTimestamp().notice: Returns the timestamp (unix time) at the moment of the shutdown

feePercentage().notice: Returns fee percentage set by the maintainer

getMintTradeInfo(uint256).notice: Returns the synthetic tokens will be received and fees will be paid in exchange for an input collateral amountThis function is only trading-informative, it doesn't check liquidity and collateralization conditions

getRedeemTradeInfo(uint256).notice: Returns the collateral amount will be received and fees will be paid in exchange for an input amount of synthetic tokensThis function is only trading-informative, it doesn't check liquidity and collateralization conditions

increaseCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Increase collaterallization of Lp positionOnly a sender with LP role can call this function

liquidate(uint256).notice: Liquidate Lp position for an amount of synthetic tokens undercollateralizedRevert if position is not undercollateralized

liquidationReward().notice: Returns the percentage of reward for correct liquidation by a liquidator

mint((uint256,uint256,uint256,address)).notice: Mint synthetic tokens using fixed amount of collateralThis calculate the price using on chain price feedUser must approve collateral transfer for the mint request to succeed

redeem((uint256,uint256,uint256,address).notice: Redeem amount of collateral using fixed number of synthetic tokenThis calculate the price using on chain price feedUser must approve synthetic token transfer for the redeem request to succeed

setFeePercentage(uint256).notice: Update the fee percentageOnly the maintainer can call this function

setFeeRecipients(address[],uint32[]).notice: Update the addresses of recipients for generated fees and proportions of fees each address will receiveOnly the maintainer can call this function

setLiquidationReward(uint256).notice: Update the liquidation reward percentageOnly the maintainer can call this function

setOverCollateralization(uint256).notice: Update the overcollateralization percentageOnly the maintainer can call this function

synthereumFinder().notice: Get Synthereum finder of the pool/self-minting derivative

syntheticToken().notice: Get the synthetic token associated to this pool/self-minting derivative

syntheticTokenSymbol().notice: Get the synthetic token symbol associated to this pool/self-minting derivative

totalCollateralAmount().notice: Returns the total amount of collateral used for collateralizing tokens (users + LP)

totalFeeAmount().notice: Returns the total amount of fees to be withdrawn

totalSyntheticTokens().notice: Returns total number of synthetic tokens generated by this pool

userFee(address).notice: Returns the user's fee to be withdrawn

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).notice: Withdraw unused deposited collateral by the LPOnly a sender with LP role can call this function
